[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [fieldRegistry](./blockly.fieldregistry_namespace.md)

## fieldRegistry namespace

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [register(type, fieldClass)](./blockly.fieldregistry_namespace.register_1_function.md) | Registers a field type. fieldRegistry.fromJson uses this registry to find the appropriate field type. |
|  [unregister(type)](./blockly.fieldregistry_namespace.unregister_1_function.md) | Unregisters the field registered with the given type. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [RegistrableField](./blockly.fieldregistry_namespace.registrablefield_interface.md) | <p>Represents the static methods that must be defined on any field that is registered, i.e. the constructor and fromJson methods.</p><p>Because we don't know which Field subclass will be registered, we are unable to typecheck the parameters of the constructor.</p> |
